# Big-Data

We have used two data sources for this project:

1)The Primary datasource is taken from kaggle which provides information about the accidents
https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/sobhanmoosavi/us-accidents
This is a countrywide car accident dataset, which covers 49 states of the USA. The accident data are collected from February 2016 to Dec 2021

2)The other dataset is extracted from the Opendatasoft
https://public.opendatasoft.com/explore/dataset/us-cities-demographics/table/?%3D%3D

This Dataset has details of population distribution in USA.
